input.name: Network Isolation
input.description: Configuring a network to deny connections based on source or destination IP address ranges.

input.name: SQL Injection
input.description: The software constructs SQL commands using externally-influenced input without proper neutralization.

input.name: Account Management
input.description: The organization manages information system accounts including establishing, activating, modifying, reviewing, disabling, and removing accounts.

input.name: Active Scanning
input.description: Adversaries may execute active reconnaissance scans to gather information that can be used during targeting.

input.name: Information System Backup
